title: Habeas Corpus
description: Marsha Kent is on trial for the murder of her husband. District Attorney Dave Williams, fed up with systemic injustice, pushes for the death penalty.
quote: What took you so long?” “Traffic was a bitch.
altHero: Julia Roberts as Marsha Kent behind bars
alt1: Sarandon and Falk in an execution viewing gallery
alt2: Marsha Kent receiving last rites from a priest
alt3: Dave Williams yells, aiming a gun
alt4: Williams carries Kent away, both looking at each other lovingly
